root.title: columbia ga system inc cg redeem debentur
root.body: columbia ga system inc sai will redeem 4.7 mln dlr princip amount 9-1/8 pct debentur seri due mai 1 1996 five mln dlr princip amount 10-1/4 pct debentur seri due mai 1 1999 compani sai redeem debentur meet mandatori sink fund requir addit columbia sai will call option sink fund redempt mai 1 1987 4.7 mln dlr princip amount 9-1/8 debentur 7.5 mln dlr 10-1/4 pct debentur
